nodes.text: The Followers of Palawa were known to have developed of a certain type of hibernation trance prior to 24,500 BBY that permitted practitioners to enter into a deep trance state and sleep for decades without aging. Some practitioners were recorded as having slept in excess of seventy standard years while engaged in this trance.

Arden Lyn, a Follower of Palawa and Steel Hand of Palawa prior to her tenure in the Legions of Lettow, was aware of this technique and was theorized to have employed it in conjunction with her Kashi Mer talisman to survive Jedi Grand Master Awdrysta Pina's use of morichro to stop her heart.
